feature1msg: Designed to be visually appealing with usability in mind
feature2msg: Built with all the tools you need to ensure responsible usage
feature3msg: Integrated with Quercus & Shibboleth for a seamless instructor experience
feature4msg: Follows WAI-ARIA principles, enables students with disabilties
feature5msg: Communicating math concepts is hard without symbols!
feature6msg: Completely transparent & open to contribution from all!
